original_text: The priest must put some of the blood on the lowest part of the person's right ear. He must put blood on the thumb of the person's right hand. And he must put blood on the big toe of the person's right foot.
korean_text: 제사장은 그 속건제물의 피를 취하여 정결함을 받을 자의 오른쪽 귓부리와 오른쪽 엄지 손가락과 오른쪽 엄지 발가락에 바를 것이요

sentences.original_text: The priest must put some of the blood
on the lowest part of the person's right ear
on the thumb of the person's right hand
on the big toe of the person's right foot
